content.p: Find the accommodation that's right for you This environmentally friendly and innovative student accommodation is located on Jubilee Campus with great access to local amenities. Situated in the quietest part of the campus by one of the beautiful lakes located there, Melton Hall has access to both academic and social facilities that will be invaluable to the postgraduates who choose it as their accommodation. Join masters student Shardul on a tour of Melton Hall and its surrounding facilities. Specifically for postgraduate students, this environmentally friendly and innovative student accommodation is located on Jubilee Campus. Accommodation is guaranteed for the first year. For added peace of mind, free cancellation, and no penalties if you do not obtain your grades, defer* your place, or are unable to obtain a visa. See full terms and conditions. Your Residential Experience Team (ResX) is available 7 days a week, from the day you arrive, until the day you leave, to support you to settle and thrive in your new home, and the fantastic community that you will belong to as a student at the University of Nottingham. Helping you make the most of your time in halls we host a range of events from big to small to help you connect with others and enjoy your time in halls. Our events are aimed to help you thrive in halls and develop as a person, learn a new skill or just have some fun. We offer a supportive and non-judgemental wellbeing service for all our hall students. We can help with a wide range of issues and challenges that you are facing. Highlighting the amazing community we are a part of and setting expectations of behaviour across our halls. In partnership with UoN Sport and as Sports University of the year 2024, the Active Living package provides exclusive sport, fitness and active events for students living in University halls on University Park and Jubilee campus, plus Dagfa and Varsity. Included within your accommodation, your Active Living package offers some incredible perks. Access our sports and fitness suites across our campuses and across the nation with the BUCS UNIversal scheme. Join in some casual sports with Just Play or get competitive with the Inter-Mural Sports teams. Plus a programme of exclusive sessions and events just for you and your new hall mates! To finalise your offer you will be required to read and accept a licence/tenancy agreement and terms and conditions from your accommodation provider University of Nottingham. You will be accepting liability for the full tenancy length of 51 weeks a year including vacation periods. Once you have moved in you are liable to pay for the duration of your licence period.
